definition: to remit by post/remittance sent by post

sentences.english: The villager people the heart is unwilling, reached this money remit by post the town.
sentences.chinese: 村民們心不甘，便將這筆錢郵匯到了縣城。

sentences.english: Is the payment by cable or mail?
It came by airmail from our London office.
sentences.chinese: 是我們倫敦辦事處航郵匯來的。

sentences.english: You can choose a method from T/T and M/T on the basis of your own needs.
sentences.chinese: 您可根據自己需要選擇電匯和郵匯辦理方式。
